name: Falling Spike
desc: A spike that will fall if Mario gets too close.

name: Para-Beetle
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and spawns facing Mario

name: ...always faces left.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and always flies to the left.

name: ...always faces right.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and always faces to the right.

name: ...face away from player.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes normal speed, and always faces away from the player.

name: Para-Beetle, slow
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes quite slowly, and spawns facing Mario.

name: ...always faces left.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes quite slowly, and always flies to the left.

name: ...always faces right.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes quite slowly, and always faces to the right.

name: ...face away from player.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes quite slowly, and always faces away from the player.

name: Para-Beetle, fast
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes rather quickly, and spawns facing Mario

name: ...always faces left.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes rather quickly, and always flies to the left.

name: ...always faces right.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes rather quickly, and always faces to the right.

name: ...face away from player.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes rather quickly, and always faces away from the player.

name: Para-Beetle, very fast
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes very quickly, and spawns facing Mario

name: ...always faces left.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes very quickly, and always flies to the left.

name: ...always faces right.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes very quickly, and always faces to the right.

name: ...face away from player.
desc: A Para-Beetle from SMB3. Mario can ride on it, but it will rise if he does. This one goes very quickly, and always faces away from the player.

name: Nipper
desc: A Nipper from SMB3 that jumps up when Mario gets close.

name: ...waits, then approaches
desc: A Nipper from SMB3 that is stationary until Mario gets close, then starts hopping towards him, making a larger jump if he gets too close.

name: ...hops towards Mario
desc: A Nipper from SMB3 that hops towards Mario, and jumps up if he gets too close.

name: ...shoots fireballs
desc: A Nipper from SMB3 that stays in place and occasionally shoots 4 fireballs at Mario.

name: Blurp
desc: A Blurp fish, that lazily swims towards Mario while oscillating up and down slighty.

name: ...moves faster
desc: A Blurp fish, that swims towards Mario while oscillating up and down.

name: Thwomp, falls down
desc: A thwomp, which quickly falls downward if Mario gets too close.

name: ...falls up
desc: A thwomp, which quickly falls upward if Mario gets too close.

name: ...falls right
desc: A thwomp, which quickly falls rightward if Mario gets too close.

name: ...falls left
desc: A thwomp, which quickly falls leftward if Mario gets too close.

name: Throw Block
desc: A block Mario can pick up and throw. It disappears 255 frames after being spawned, respawning if it disappears this way. It will not respawn if broken.

name: ...disappears permanently
desc: A block Mario can pick up and throw. It disappears 255 frames after being spawned, and doesn't respawn again.
